recipeInstructions.@value: Remove from oven and cool completely before serving.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Using a small cookie scoop, measure 1-inch balls of cookie dough and place on the baking sheet. Using a fork, press across the dough and again in a perpendicular pattern.
Bake for 8 to 9 minutes. Cookies will be slightly puffed.
In a bowl, cream together the peanut butter and sugar until fluffy. Add the egg, vanilla, baking soda, and salt. Mix until well blended.
